General.Name: Asia Brands Bhd
General.Description: Asia Brands Berhad, an investment holding company, wholesales, retails, and distributes ready-made casual wear, baby and children wear, lingerie and ladies wear, and related accessories primarily in Malaysia. It offers a range of baby products, including fashion-wear, feeding equipment, toiletries, diapers, accessories, strollers, playpens, and other products under Anakku brand name; and innerwear products, such as brassieres, panties, corsets, girdles, camisoles, bodysuits, crop tops, boxer shorts, and sleepwear lingerie under the Audrey, Cottonshop, Kawaii, and Lilian brands. The company also provides share services, such as finance, human resources, IT, administrative, and others; and sub-licensing services, as well as engages in trading and retail of household, hygiene, health, and cosmetic products. It offers its products through heavy traffic outlets, distributors, and retail boutique outlets. The company was formerly known as Hing Yiap Group Berhad and changed its name to Asia Brands Berhad in 2013. Asia Brands Berhad was incorporated in 1975 and is based in Klang, Malaysia.
